alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued August 21 at 7:34PM MST until August 21 at 8:30PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... West central Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... * Until 830 PM MST. * At 732 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from Temple to 15 miles northwest of Valentine, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph. SOURCE...Detected by National Weather Service meteorologists. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * Motorists on US 93 north of Kingman and South of the Hoover Dam should prepare for low visibility. Locations impacted include... Windy Point Campground, Packsaddle Campground, Chloride, Valentine, Dolan Springs, Pierce Ferry And Antares Roads and New Kingman-Butler. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
